Reviews.Title: “Very Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Nickyvandenberg
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for two nights for a city trip to HK! The hotel is very new and sophisticated. The hotel and the room have all a beatiful design. The staff was very friendly. The location could be better but you are within 5 min. at the metrostation. So I would say....perfect hotel to stay for business or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel. Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: basmaberti
Reviews.Content: I loved élan. The rooms are spacious, pretty and techy (we had an iPad to control the different lights, etc). The breakfast was very tasty. The hotel is a 25 mins subway ride to the city center. Also the subway station is less than 5 mins walk from the subway station which is very convenient.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, too bad about the pool”
Reviews.Author: Koba_1982
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights. Not located in the 'middle of the action' in HK, but MTR is just 5 minutes walking. 15 minutes later you're on Nathan's Road. Complimentary iPad to use in your room, very nice. Can also be used to order your breakfast in your room, see your balance, etc. Breakfast was good. Clean comfy room. Only downside was the fact that the pool is closed until further notice. Apparently they can't get a permit for it. They really should have mentioned it somewhere on their site or booking.com, as we booked it partly because of the rooftop pool.

Reviews.Title: “Business hotel. Compact, convenient and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: WDL_Travelguru
Reviews.Content: The Lhotel élan was very comfortable even though I stayed just for a night. The staff were very courteous. The food was with limited choice, tasty though. The Ngau Tau Kok station is just round the corner and accessibility through the MTR is fantastic. The hotel is brand new and fitted with good interiors, gadgets including an IPad for your exclusive use. Whether introductory or otherwise, the offers, service and experience was worth it. Go for it, if you have business or leisure to deal with, while in that part of HK !!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: chriscoe777
Reviews.Content: Had a short stay bout 3 days.Hotel was more than what I expected.Had a big room..very modern and clean.Staff were friendly and helpful.Had breakfast once and was fine but there were only 1 girl working and had to wait some time for coffee refil.but besides that everything was 5 star!

Reviews.Title: ““Good business hotel for the kwun tong area””
Reviews.Author: Pavla P
Reviews.Content: I was in a business trip to Hong Kong for few days and the hotel is ideal if you have the office in Kowlon area. Clean, comfortable, with excellent views and with a resonable price, I think it is a good option for a short stay.

Reviews.Title: “BAD customer service!”
Reviews.Author: Fiona C
Reviews.Content: I sent an email inquiring a long stay from Dec 5 to Dec 27. Assisant manager Samuel responsed : For your information, as of our hotel is new opened, and the long stay rateis not yet finalized available for your captioned stay period. So I sent an other email to inquire for a regular room rate. From there, NO response. I was patient enough to give it a 3rd attempt and asked if there's room available during my requested time-NO response. Honestly, this is a new hotel and being new is NOT an excuse of not delivering services. If the managment team is reading this review, please make a note that customer service always comes in the first place in the hotel industry!

Reviews.Title: “New, Modern hotel with Nice Rooms but Service is below Par”
Reviews.Author: VictoriaSommers
Reviews.Content: My stay was during the first week of its operation. My client booked this hotel for me as the rate was very attractive then (below HKD1000 inclusive of breakfast). The room is of course brand new, very modern, kind of eco-friendly and extremely hi-tech. The TV comes with a 50-inch screen, a big i-pad awaits you at the bedside, so on and so forth; you won't be disappointed as far as the room is concerned. We also used the ballrooms for some events; the banquet staff was courteous but breakfast was very mediocre. What went wrong during my stay (I think 4 nights) was that the staff wasn't properly trained in terms of processes and protocol. 1. The lobby is often empty with no staff manning the reception because check-in is supposed to be done on one of the higher floors. If however no one is on the ground floor how would we know about that? 2. The daily package came with free drinks in the fridge but I wasn't told. My other colleague who checked in was told and I only found out on the last night. 3. I gave the staff my credit card and passport upon check-in, the lady used an i-pad to key in the details but to my amazement, I was told they didn't have my records when I checked out. All these go to show that technology wouldn't help that much if the staff wasn't trained. 4. One afternoon, I was in the room on a business call. The housekeeping staff rang the bell but I couldn't answer it. Within a few seconds, he opened the door with his card key and I was just in a bathrobe! 5. Yet another night, I tried to get the Front Desk to give me a wake-up call. I tried calling many times within 1.5 hours but no one picked up. The next day, I was told that the staff incidentally left his post to attend to something else. I couldn't believe it, it's supposed to be a 24-hour service and he left his post for more than an hour? 6. When I first walked into my room, it smelled of tobacco (it's supposed to be a no-smoking floor). The manager came over and told me that they couldn't do anything about it if some other guests chose to smoke on a non-smoking floor. While this might be true, I find the response inappropriate and undiplomatic. Having said that though, the hotel's only restaurant offers great Japanese and Italian fusion food. The sashimi is fresh and the dessert wonderful! I was in HK again last week and the client threw a party at the hotel. Our meal with a party of 17 took 3 hours to complete, though the restaurant had no more than 4 tables to serve on that night! All in all, the hotel I think has much to improve on but the rate is attractive enough for someone who doesn't mind the distance and the occasional clumsy service.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Basje_74
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, clean, good quality room. Nice check-in at top floor, modern gym and iPad in the room is a nice touch.
